text: Jenna Dewan Tatum impressed viewers during Thursday's episode of Live with Kelly and Ryan. The stunning dancer replaced Kelly Ripa while she takes a vacation, and Twitter users gushed about the stand - in. Jenna looked stunning in a pale pink Lela Rose lace dress and Jimmy Choo black heels as she and Ryan Seacrest chatted back and forth about the day's hot topics. Jenna Dewan Tatum received a lot of praise after her stint on the morning chat show with Ryan Seacrest. ( Credit : Live with Kelly and Ryan ) Read more : Oprah Winfrey Reveals Exactly Why She Struggles To Accept Herself But what most were amazed at was how Jenna knocked back a whole glass of whisky at 9 a. m. And guess who challenged her? None
